typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		PROVIDER_ID as string,
		FIRST_NAME as string,
		MIDDLE_NAME as string,
		LASTNAME as string,
		MUNICIPALITY as string,
		OFFICIAL_CITY as string,
		PROVIDER_REGION as string,
		GROUP_PROVIDER_ID as string,
		GROUP_NAME as string,
		{Provider_Group_Status            } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Address_1         } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Address_2         } as string,
		{Provider_Group_City              } as string,
		{Provider_Group_State_Code        } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Zip_Code          } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Contact           } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Phone             } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Fax               } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Email             } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Group_Date        } as string,
		{Provider_Group_End_Date          } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Type              } as string,
		{Provider_Group_Function_Indicator  } as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(GROUP_PROVIDER_ID = iif(isNull(GROUP_PROVIDER_ID), 'NA', GROUP_PROVIDER_ID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		Provider_Group_ID as string,
		Provider_Group_Name as string,
		Provider_Group_Status as string,
		Provider_Group_Address_1 as string,
		Provider_Group_Address_2 as string,
		Provider_Group_City as string,
		Provider_Group_State_Code as string,
		Provider_Group_Zip_Code as string,
		Provider_Group_Contact as string,
		Provider_Group_Phone as string,
		Provider_Group_Fax as string,
		Provider_Group_Email as string,
		Provider_Group_Group_Date as date,
		Provider_Group_End_Date as date,
		Provider_Group_Type as string,
		Provider_Group_Function_Indicator as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Provider_Group_ID = GROUP_PROVIDER_ID,
		Provider_Group_Name = GROUP_NAME,
		Provider_Group_Status = {Provider_Group_Status            },
		Provider_Group_Address_1 = {Provider_Group_Address_1         },
		Provider_Group_Address_2 = {Provider_Group_Address_2         },
		Provider_Group_City = {Provider_Group_City              },
		Provider_Group_State_Code = {Provider_Group_State_Code        },
		Provider_Group_Zip_Code = {Provider_Group_Zip_Code          },
		Provider_Group_Contact = {Provider_Group_Contact           },
		Provider_Group_Phone = {Provider_Group_Phone             },
		Provider_Group_Fax = {Provider_Group_Fax               },
		Provider_Group_Email = {Provider_Group_Email             },
		Provider_Group_Group_Date = {Provider_Group_Group_Date        },
		Provider_Group_End_Date = {Provider_Group_End_Date          },
		Provider_Group_Type = {Provider_Group_Type              },
		Provider_Group_Function_Indicator = {Provider_Group_Function_Indicator  }
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
